article_node.title: Inflation Revival – Tariffs Start Hitting Consumers Directly Today
article_node.summary: Lawrence Fuller, a 30‑year veteran of Wall Street, founded Fuller Asset Management and now runs the Focused Growth portfolio on Dub, the first regulator‑approved copy‑trading platform in the U.S. He promotes his strategies via Substack and other channels, emphasizing that the information is educational and not a solicitation. Fuller’s firm is a state‑registered investment adviser, and the article disclaims any material conflicts or positions in the companies discussed.
